title: Project: Public Service
creator_credit: Shan Benson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Commonwealth Public Service as seen through the eyes of a school-boy preparing a project book on the work of the Service. The film also briefly outlines the functioning of the parliamentary system and role of the public servants.
creator_credit_for_label: Shan Benson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
